skills.name: UNSEEN STRIKE
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 75% Chance to Remove All Beneficial Effects on the enemy.
• Heal all allies based on their ATK and MAGIC stat.

skills.name: NEVERENDING ABYSS
desc: • Remove All Golden Effects on the enemy, excluding Shroud, Perfect Immortality, and Soul Protect.
• Revive a random ally with full HP for every Golden effect removed.
• Grant Endure to all allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: BOOK OF VOID
desc: Immunity to all Burn and Stat Reduction Effects. Grant Immunity to Doom, Sleep, and Perfect Sleep to all allies. Steal One Beneficial Effect, including Golden Effects from a random enemy after every action.
